description:
Go a little faster. These performance-ready touring poles pair a comfy synthetic cork grip on a lightweight aluminum shaft. With a race-inspired wrist strap, they're easy to adjust, without any extra weight to hold you back.

  • Lightweight 5086 aluminum
  • 16mm diameter upper to 11mm tip diameter
  • Synthetic cork grip for light comfortable handling
  • Secure race-inspired wrist strap
  • Touring XL basket provides good float in deeper snow
  • Steel tip for ice and compact snow
name: Rossignol FT-600 Cork-Grip Poles - Unisex
